description:
Hello Agile Connect Braga community members, here comes our 8th Meetup!

Happening on the 13th of March. This time we've got something new planned for you. We are going to have an Open Space followed by a Lean Coffee session. Take a look, and hurry up to RSVP.

Agenda:

• Welcome
• Open Space session
• Networking break – Coffee break
• Lean Coffee session
• Closing

The event is taking place at PRIMAVERA BSS (https://pt.primaverabss.com/pt/).

Obs.: At the end of the event, we traditionally go to some restaurant nearby for dinner and keep talking about Agile. Feel free to join us ;-)

More info in https://www.meetup.com/pt-BR/Agile-Connect-Braga/events/248465101/

See you there & bring a friend!
name: Braga Meetup #08 - Open Space
